page.title: 13TRANSPORT
page.content: {THE ROADS IN THIS AREA ARE ONLY LANES {INTENDED FOR COUNTRY USE BUT BECAUSE {THEY CONNECT WITH FAST MAJOR ROAD {SYSTEMS WHICH THEMSELVES CONNECT WITH {GOOD MOTORWAY SYSTEMS GIVING ACCESS TO {AIRPORTS/SEAPORTS THEY ARE SUBJECT TO {USE FOR WHICH THEY WERE NOT DESIGNED. OUR RAIL SYSTEMS ARE EXTERNAL TO THE AREA,BETCHWORTH IS ON THE EAST-WEST TONBRIDGE TO READING LINE WHICH MEANS CONNECTIONS CAN BE MADE TO LONDON VIA REDHILL,READING&TONBRIDGE. THIS LINE ESCAPED THE "BEECHING" CUTS DUE TO THE POSSIBILITY OF A CHANNEL TUNNEL WHICH IS STILL BEING TALKED ABOUT. {BUSES-SEE AMENITY COUNT/COMMUNICATIONS AIR TRAVEL-SEE COMMUNICATIONS-A VERY GOOD SETTING OFF POINT IS THIS AREA. {RIVER MOLE-ALTHOUGH WE HAVE BEEN ON {THE MOLE IN OUR INFLATABLE BOATS IT IS {NOT NAVIGABLE,IT ENTERS THE RIVER {THAMES AT MOLESLEY.}FOOTPATHS ABOUND!
